form.name: treatment_of_bloody_diarrhoea_with_intramuscular_benzylpenicillin_gentamicin_1
form.page_subtitle: PNC References: PNC References Treatment of Bloody Diarrhoea with Benzylpenicillin & Gentamicin> Treatment of Bloody Diarrhoea with Intramuscular Benzylpenicillin & Gentamicin 1

field.name: Give first dose of Benzylpenicillin, intramuscularly AND
Give first dose of Gentamicin intramuscularly
* Note: avoid using undiluted 40 mg/mL gentamicin
